summary: The diff adds a Motoko backend actor with data models (branches/semesters/subjects/notes/papers/MCQs/syllabus/user profile), plus a new React/TanStack Router frontend with admin guards, content upload/management components, search bar, and common loading/empty/error states. However, some specified deliverables are not evidenced in the provided diff summary (notably the required generated branch icon assets), and there is at least one unrequested branding/link addition in the footer.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add static generated icons/illustrations for the seven branches and display them on branch cards and/or headers (icons must be present in frontend/public/assets/generated).
missing_requirements.reason: Branch cards expect an icon URL prop, but the diff summary does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated or the required PNG icon filenames.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a promotional/attribution link to caffeine.ai (with UTM parameters) and 'Built with ... using caffeine.ai' text.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; adds external branding/marketing content to a user-facing area.
